listitem.para: sets the hostname of the machine on which the database is run
sets the name of the database in which the tables are stored
sets the JDBC driver used to access the database (Only MySQL is currently working.)
sets the username of the account with which the database can be accessed
sets the password for the account with which the database can be accessed
create the default tables in the chemical database
lists all information on the tables in the chemical database
deletes all tables from the chemical database

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: cdk-dbadmin is used to prepare and delete tables from a chemical database.
